publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2897 Ms Wendy Alexander: The Draft Bus Users Complaints Tribunal Regulations 2002-That the Transport and the Environment Committee, in consideration of the draft Bus Users Complaints Tribunal Regulations 2002, recommends that the Regulations be approved. Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
